CustomField.description: What is the document management system at this firm?
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( INCLUDES(DMSPortfolio__c, "Interwoven"), INCLUDES(DMSPortfolio__c, "Interwoven Unknown"), INCLUDES(DMSPortfolio__c, "iManage"), INCLUDES(DMSPortfolio__c, "Hosted iManage"), INCLUDES(DMSPortfolio__c, "HP"), INCLUDES(DMSPortfolio__c, "Autonomy")), "iManage", IF( OR( INCLUDES(DMSPortfolio__c, "DM5"), INCLUDES(DMSPortfolio__c, "DM6"), INCLUDES(DMSPortfolio__c, "DOCS Open"), INCLUDES(DMSPortfolio__c, "Hummingbird Unknown"), INCLUDES(DMSPortfolio__c, "Open Text"), INCLUDES(DMSPortfolio__c, "Open Text Livelink")), "Open Text", IF( INCLUDES(DMSPortfolio__c, "NetDocuments"), "NetDocuments", IF( ISBLANK(DMSPortfolio__c), "Unknown", "Other"))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: What is the document management system at this firm?
CustomField.label: DMS - Simple
